description: Test fixtures for aspect analysis validation

articles.name: Positive Revenue
articles.headline: Apple Revenue Surges Past Estimates
articles.summary: Apple Inc. reported revenue of $95B, beating analyst estimates of $92B by 3%.

articles.name: Positive Earnings
articles.headline: Microsoft Crushes Earnings Expectations
articles.summary: Microsoft reported EPS of $2.50, significantly exceeding the $2.20 consensus.

articles.name: Negative Guidance
articles.headline: Tesla Lowers Full-Year Outlook
articles.summary: Tesla reduced its full-year guidance citing weak demand and pricing pressure.

articles.name: Mixed Sentiment - Revenue Beat, Earnings Miss
articles.headline: Amazon Beats Revenue But Misses Earnings
articles.summary: Amazon reported revenue growth of 15% but earnings fell short of expectations by 10%.

expectedScores.note: Overall slightly negative because EARNINGS weight (30%) > REVENUE weight (25%)

articles.name: Margin Compression
articles.headline: Walmart Margins Under Pressure
articles.summary: Operating margins compressed to 3.5% from 4.2% as costs rose faster than revenue.

expectedScores.note: Mixed signals: revenue up but margins compressed

articles.name: Debt Reduction
articles.headline: Ford Reduces Debt Load Significantly
articles.summary: Ford paid down $5B in total debt, improving its balance sheet and credit rating.

articles.name: Accelerating Growth
articles.headline: Nvidia Growth Accelerating on AI Demand
articles.summary: Year-over-year growth accelerated to 30%, up from 20% last quarter.

articles.name: Comprehensive Positive - All Aspects
articles.headline: Google Reports Stellar Quarter Across All Metrics
articles.summary: Google beat on revenue and earnings, raised guidance, expanded margins, accelerated growth, and reduced debt.

expectedScores.note: All aspects positive, high confidence from multiple signals

articles.name: Negation Pattern
articles.headline: Meta Revenue Did Not Beat Expectations
articles.summary: Meta reported revenue that did not meet analyst forecasts, falling short by 2%.

expectedScores.note: Negation 'did not beat' should flip to negative

articles.name: Intensity Modifier - Significant
articles.headline: Netflix Significantly Beats Subscriber Growth
articles.summary: Netflix added 10M subscribers, significantly exceeding the 7M estimate.

expectedScores.note: Intensity modifier 'significantly' should amplify positive score

articles.name: Neutral Mention
articles.headline: Disney Reports Quarterly Results
articles.summary: Disney announced revenue and earnings for Q1 as expected.

expectedScores.note: No clear positive or negative signals, should be neutral

articles.name: No Financial Aspects
articles.headline: Apple CEO Speaks at Technology Conference
articles.summary: Tim Cook discussed innovation and the future of technology at a recent conference.

expectedScores.note: General news with no financial aspects detected
